content.rendered:
OTHER COMPANIES

We’re more than construction and building materials. The Stewart Companies has diversified into other markets such as aviation services.

  • Building Materials
  • Construction
  • Real Estate
  • Automotive
  • Other

Rounding Out a Portfolio of Companies

The York Airport is one of the USA’s busiest privately-owned, public-use municipal airports. In addition, it provides community support services such as hosting a regional Med-Evac helicopter and flight training.

YORK AVIATION

Located in York County in South Central Pennsylvania, York Aviation offers a variety of services and events to both pilots and members of the community alike.
